mapper.select: SELECT m.menu_name FROM tb_merchant_role_menu mrm INNER JOIN tb_menu m ON m.id=mrm.menu_id INNER JOIN tb_merchant_role mr ON mr.id=mrm.merchant_role_id WHERE mr.id=#{MerchantId}

SELECT m.id,m.parent_id,m.real_name,mr.role_position,m.user_name,m.login_mobile,m.status,m.create_date,me.id as mid,me.menu_name,me.menu_zhname,me.create_date as mcreate_date,me.update_date as mupdate_date FROM tb_merchant m INNER JOIN tb_merchant_role mr ON m.role_id=mr.id INNER JOIN tb_merchant_role_menu mrm ON mrm.merchant_role_id=mr.id INNER JOIN tb_menu me ON mrm.menu_id=me.id where m.id=#{merchantId} or m.parent_id = #{merchantId}

SELECT m.id,m.parent_id,m.real_name,mr.role_position,m.user_name,m.mobile_code as login_mobile,m.status,m.create_date,me.id as mid,me.menu_name,me.menu_zhname,me.create_date as mcreate_date,me.update_date as mupdate_date FROM tb_managers m INNER JOIN tb_merchant_role mr ON m.role_id=mr.id INNER JOIN tb_merchant_role_menu mrm ON mrm.merchant_role_id=mr.id INNER JOIN tb_menu me ON mrm.menu_id=me.id WHERE m.id=#{managersId} OR m.parent_id=#{managersId}
